description: Informations about a cluster have become available for the agent.
The value of the object 'fscHaClSubAgentInfoOperScope' has been

event.Summary: Information is available for HaCl cluster $v1 (scope: $v2)

description: Scope of Information supplied by the subagent:
The Information does not correspond to the other enumerated
The agent is capable to supply the complete information
about the cluster and the cluster entities: systems,
The agent has only a restricted view. It supplies complete
information only about applications which run on a subset of
The agent supplies information only about applications which
No Information about the Cluster is available.

The agent supplies information only about applications which

description: The cluster monitoring, which is the main source of informations
for the agent has changed its state.
The Information does not correspond to the other enumerated values.
The cluster monitoring is active. Informations about the cluster
No cluster monitoring is active. No informations about the cluster
The cluster monitoring has been started but is not completely
The cluster monitoring has been stopped and is coming down. No
informations about the cluster can be supplied.
- The state of the cluster monitoring is presently pending. It is
not operating for the moment. Presently no informations about
variables.name: FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClClusterMonitoringState

description: The state of a system has changed.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemStateChanged FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClClusterName s EXAMPLE1 FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemName s EXAMPLE FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemState i 5
$SNMPTRAPCMD FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemStateChanged FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClClusterName s EXAMPLE1 FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemName s EXAMPLE FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemState i 3
$SNMPTRAPCMD FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemStateChanged FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClClusterName s EXAMPLE2 FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemName s EXAMPLE FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemState i 2

description: The Hostname of the System. The value of this object must be
identical with the value of the object 'fscHaClSubAgentLocalNodeName'
which would be supplied by a SNMP cluster agent running on
variables.name: FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemName

description: The Information does not correspond to the other enumerated
The system has been terminated normally.
A system failure occurred. It has been terminated abnormally.
variables.name: FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemState

description: The state of an application has changed on a system.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClApplicationStateChanged FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClClusterName s EXAMPLE FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClApplicationName s EXAMPLE1 FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemName s EXAMPLE FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClAppSysRelState i 7

$SNMPTRAPCMD FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClApplicationStateChanged FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClClusterName s EXAMPLE FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClApplicationName s EXAMPLE1 FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemName s EXAMPLE FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClAppSysRelState i 4

$SNMPTRAPCMD FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClApplicationStateChanged FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClClusterName s EXAMPLE FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClApplicationName s EXAMPLE2 FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemName s EXAMPLE FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClAppSysRelState i 3

description: The Hostname of the System. The value of this object must be
identical with the value of the object 'fscHaClSubAgentLocalNodeName'
which would be supplied by a SNMP cluster agent running on
variables.name: FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemName

description: State of the application concerning the system.
The Information does not correspond to the other enumerated
The application does not have a defined state.
The application is running on this system.
This value corresponds to the state 'work' in HiplexAF.
The application is not running on the system
but the system is ready to take over the application.
This value corresponds to the state 'standby' in HiplexAF.
The application is stopped on the system. The system is not
ready to take over the application.
This value corresponds to the state 'terminated' in HiplexAF.
The last run of the application was terminated by a failure.
The system is not ready to take over the application.
This value corresponds to the state 'crashed' in HiplexAF.
variables.name: FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClAppSysRelState

description: The state of a resource which belongs to an online application
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClResourceStateChanged FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClClusterName s EXAMPLE FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClResourceName s EXAMPLE1 FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClResourceState i 6 FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClApplicationName s EXAMPLE FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemName s EXAMPLE

$SNMPTRAPCMD FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClResourceStateChanged FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClClusterName s EXAMPLE FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClResourceName s EXAMPLE1 FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClResourceState i 5 FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClApplicationName s EXAMPLE FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemName s EXAMPLE

$SNMPTRAPCMD FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClResourceStateChanged FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClClusterName s EXAMPLE FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClResourceName s EXAMPLE2 FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClResourceState i 4 FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClApplicationName s EXAMPLE FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemName s EXAMPLE

description: The Information does not correspond to the other enumerated
The resource does not have a defined state.
The resource is not monitored. Its state has no impact on the
This value corresponds to the state 'running' in HiplexAF.
This value corresponds to the state 'terminated' in HiplexAF.
The resource is unavailable, because of a failure.
This value corresponds to the state 'crashed' in HiplexAF.
variables.name: FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClResourceState

description: The Hostname of the System. The value of this object must be
identical with the value of the object 'fscHaClSubAgentLocalNodeName'
which would be supplied by a SNMP cluster agent running on
variables.name: FSC-HACL-MIB::fscHaClSystemName
